1.0.name: wordpress/megavideo-full-screen
1.0.description:
**** Open Megavideo Full Screen in a New Window. Just use [mega]paste Megavideo url here[/mega] and it will create a link to open the Megavideo video full screen in a new window, in the Megavideo player.

For more information visit the plugin website. MegaVideoPop.com

Example code:

This: Click here to [mega]http://www.megavideo.com/?v=JPN400BH[/mega] Becomes this: Click here to Watch Now
